Update Participant

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{
    content: {
      "application/json": {
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          example: {
            groupJid: "120363404495022854@g.us",
            participants: ["5531900000000@s.whatsapp.net"],
            action: "promote",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      description: "Successful response",
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            example: {
              message: "Participante actualizado exitosamente",
              data: { groupJid: "120363404495022854@g.us" },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
